chapters.title: Chapter 11: Talk of Debts
chapters.info: Adeleas Namelle, p. 293 (347)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, one of two Aes Sedai who went into voluntary retreat many years ago to Tifan's Well, a village located in the grassy plains of Arafel, along with her sister Vandene. Their goal was some day to write the complete history of the World since the Breaking, and some even before that. Mat cannot tell Adeleas and Vandene apart, even though they are not twins. Adeleas was brutally murdered, along with Ispan Shefar, the Black Sister she was guarding at the time, by an unknown assassin. Elayne has no doubt that Adeleas's killer is one or more of Merilille Ceandevin, Careane Fransi, and Sareitha Tomares. See also Namelle, Vandene.
